data.title: List of Sigma Phi Epsilon chapters
data.text:
The following is a list of the chapters of the Sigma Phi Epsilon fraternity. They are listed by school name, their Greek letter designation, and the year in which it was first chartered. Inactive (closed) chapters are noted in italics, while chapters that are currently Sigma Epsilon Chapters (SEC: newly formed chapters not yet chartered, sometimes known as "colonies") and chapters which are Residential Learning Communities (RLC) are noted as well.[1]

List of Sigma Phi Epsilon chapters by state
